  • Method Details

    • connect

      public RMQProvider connect(String host, int port, String username, String password, String virtualHost)
      Connect to the RabbitMQ instance at the provided host and port. The credentials and virtual host name are hard-coded.
      Parameters:
      host - The hostname.
      port - The port (if -1 default is used).
      username - The username.
      password - The password.
      virtualHost - The virtual host name.

    • bind

      public RMQProvider bind()
      Binds this connection and starts listening for messages on both the local queue and the publishing queue.

    • send

      public void send(slatepowered.reco.Message message, String target)

      target - The target.
